generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Item Components Swing Duration
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Duration, in seconds, of the item's swing animation played when mining or attacking. Affects visuals only and does not impact attack frequency or other gameplay mechanics.
